Meet Our Legal Team & Tax Professionals

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_team_member name=”Kristen Bemis” position=”General Counsel” image_url=”/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/kristen-bemis-23.jpg” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” header_text_color=”gcid-4859e460-78dc-4693-8386-ded0cf708620″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Roboto Flex||||||||” position_font=”|||on|||||” position_text_color=”#040011″ position_font_size=”12px” position_letter_spacing=”1.5px” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”30px||30px||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_direction=”left” body_text_align_tablet=”justify” body_text_align_phone=”left” body_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_member_description=”padding-top: 15px” border_radii_image=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all_image=”0.1px” border_color_all_image=”rgba(206,206,206,0.45)” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-4859e460-78dc-4693-8386-ded0cf708620%22:%91%22header_text_color%22%93}”]

Kristen Bemis has 15 years of legal experience advising financial service companies regarding regulatory and compliance issues. She helps to make sure Affordable adheres to the highest standards and maintains best practices within the industry. She was admitted to practice in both states of California and Nevada. She earned a Bachelor of Arts in Political Science from the University of San Diego and a Juris Doctorate from the University of the Pacific, McGeorge School of Law.

Philip Hwang is a California licensed attorney dedicated to delivering industry-leading representation for all post-filing tax matters. He has a wide range of experience in tax law ranging from working at the South Brooklyn Low Income Tax Clinic to providing audit defense and international tax planning for multinational corporations. Philip earned his Juris Doctorate degree from Hofstra University School of Law with a concentration in Taxation Law and holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in Philosophy from the University of California, Berkeley. He is also admitted to practice before the U.S. Tax Court.

Nick Hashimi brings over a decade of legal expertise, specializing in financial services. Leveraging a strong business acumen, Nick provides practical solutions across Affordable’s business units. He plays a pivotal role in guiding operations teams and overseeing complex client matters. Collaborating closely with the marketing and brand management team, Nick advises on state and federal marketing laws, ensuring compliance and best practices across all channels. His educational background includes a B.S. in Psychology and Social Behavior from the University of California, Irvine, and a law degree from Whittier Law School with a concentration in business law.

With over a decade of experience, Carlos is committed to ensuring Affordable’s clients receive world-class service and results. Earning a Juris Doctorate with a concentration in Business Law from Whittier Law School and a Master of Laws in Taxation from Chapman University, he also holds a B.A. in History and Political Science from the University of California, Los Angeles. Carlos is a member of the California State Bar and is licensed to practice law in California.

[/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_team_member name=”Michael Wenkart, Esq.” position=”Tax Attorney” image_url=”/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/michael-wenkart.jpg” _builder_version=”4.23.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#333333″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Roboto Flex||||||||” position_font=”|||on|||||” position_text_color=”#040011″ position_font_size=”12px” position_letter_spacing=”1.5px” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”30px||30px||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” body_text_align_tablet=”justify” body_text_align_phone=”left” body_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_member_description=”padding-top: 15px” border_radii_image=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all_image=”0.1px” border_color_all_image=”rgba(206,206,206,0.45)” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-4859e460-78dc-4693-8386-ded0cf708620%22:%91%22header_text_color%22%93}”]

Michael graduated from Chapman University with a B.S. in Business Administration as well as a J.D. and LL.M. in taxation from the University of San Diego. He has experience in tax preparation, researching complex tax issues especially international tax issues including inversions. As a member of the RO team at Affordable, his focus now is assisting clients to navigate and defend against the aggressive collection tactics of the IRS’s revenue officers.

He graduated with a Bachelor of Arts in Business Administration with a concentration in Accounting from Cal State University, San Bernardino. As a member of our specialized Audit Team, he works tirelessly to achieve the best results for his clients.

He has managed everything from small publicly traded companies to mid-size not-for-profits. With this extensive accounting experience and as a Certified QuickBooks ProAdvisor, Daniel is uniquely qualified to assist our business and audit clients.

Before joining Affordable, Radley worked at the IRS as a Revenue Agent for nearly a decade. After years of investigating taxpayers and assessing taxes, Radley decided to switch sides – bringing his expertise and knowledge of the IRS to Affordable, defending taxpayers’ rights and fighting to ensure people are treated fairly by the IRS. As part of our Audit Team, Radley works tirelessly on behalf of our clients, taking particular pride in guiding people out from under their tax problems and educating them on best practices that’ll help them avoid audits in the future.

Meet Our Founders

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_team_member name=”Harry Langenberg” position=”Co-founder / Managing Partner” image_url=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/harry-langenberg-photo.jpg” twitter_url=”http://twitter.com/harrylangenberg” linkedin_url=”https://www.linkedin.com/pub/harry-langenberg/2/22/a77″ _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#333333″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Roboto Flex||||||||” position_font=”|||on|||||” position_text_color=”#040011″ position_font_size=”12px” position_letter_spacing=”1.5px” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”30px||30px||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” link_option_url_new_window=”on” body_text_align_tablet=”justify” body_text_align_phone=”left” body_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_member_description=”padding-top: 15px” border_radii_image=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all_image=”0.1px” border_color_all_image=”rgba(206,206,206,0.45)” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-4859e460-78dc-4693-8386-ded0cf708620%22:%91%22header_text_color%22%93}”]

Harry Langenberg, has over 20 years of financial services experience, including investment banking for technology-based firms at Merrill Lynch. He is a graduate of both the Wharton Business School and the School of Engineering at the University of Pennsylvania.  Harry serves on the Board of the Better Business Bureau of the Pacific Southwest and is a Board member of the Orangewood Foundation, a local charity supporting foster youth and neglected children. He is also a member of Young Presidents’ Organization, a global leadership community.

visit: HarryLangenberg.com

[/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_team_member name=”Jesse Stockwell” position=”Co-founder / Managing Partner” image_url=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/jesse-stockwell-photo.jpeg” linkedin_url=”https://www.linkedin.com/pub/jesse-stockwell/51/559/8a6″ _builder_version=”4.27.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#333333″ header_font_size=”18px” header_line_height=”1.4em” body_font=”Roboto Flex||||||||” position_font=”|||on|||||” position_text_color=”#040011″ position_font_size=”12px” position_letter_spacing=”1.5px” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”30px||30px||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” body_text_align_tablet=”justify” body_text_align_phone=”left” body_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_member_description=”padding-top: 15px” border_radii_image=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all_image=”0.1px” border_color_all_image=”rgba(206,206,206,0.45)” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-4859e460-78dc-4693-8386-ded0cf708620%22:%91%22header_text_color%22%93}”]

Jesse Stockwell brings close to 25 years of consumer finance experience helping individuals in need of specialized financial guidance. He has a passion for venture initiation, business ethics, and vertical integration to help achieve profitability and best-in-class services quickly. Jesse has held positions in investment banking with Prudential Financial as well as Houlihan Lokey in San Francisco and is also a graduate of The Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania with concentrations in finance and entrepreneurial management. He co-founded the non-profit Affordable Cares Foundation and is also a member of the Young Presidents’ Organization.

visit: JesseStockwell.com
